title: Castalia temporarily down
author: VD
content_html: No worries. It’s neither DDOS or deplatforming; we have partial access to the server. It’s just a WordPress database error; we may need to wait until tomorrow morning to get it resolved, though.
content_text: No worries. It’s neither DDOS or deplatforming; we have partial access to the server. It’s just a WordPress database error; we may need to wait until tomorrow morning to get it resolved, though.
